name: Teleporter Trouble (KV_Kingdom)
description:
A teleporter is out of control, and it's up to you to get it working right again! Explore crazy locales, battle bizarre monsters, and rescue your friend!

Don't forget to load up your spells before setting out on adventure - combat is out of control, too!

Features:

  • Random level selection
  • Randomized attacks
  • Hand-drawn art

This is an entry for GameMaker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020

Theme - Out Of Control

Created with RPG Maker MV
